Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient with C/O mild fatigue for 11 days that is frequent. pt also reports mild easy fatigability, mild pallor, Blood. pt is a 49 yo male concierge. he denies drinking alcohol he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 184 cm, Weight 57 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Skin = pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 1 mg/kg daily, and ordered CBC with Manual Differential.

td.content: s:a white male concierge aged 51 years with C/O mild easy fatigability, mild fatigue and mild pallor. o:Height 184 cm, Weight 56.6 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Skin = pallor, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Hemolytic Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 1 mg/kg daily, and ordered CBC with Manual Differential.
